title: Ancient cures and AI: WHO seeks evidence for traditional medicine
description: The World Health Organization opens a major conference on traditional medicine on Wednesday, arguing that new technologies, including artificial intelligence, can bring scientific scrutiny to centuries-old healing practices.

title: With freebies, OpenAI, Google vie for Indian users and training data
description: OpenAI, Google and Perplexity have begun an unprecedented fight for artificial intelligence users in India, rolling out freebies in a strategy seen as a way to harvest troves of multilingual training data in the world's most populous nation.
content: BENGALURU, Dec 17 (Reuters) - OpenAI, Google and Perplexity have begun an unprecedented fight for artificial intelligence users in India, rolling out freebies in a strategy seen as a way to harvest troves of multilingual training data in the world's ... [3768 chars]

title: AI Powerhouses Offer Freebies to Capture India's Growing Market
description: OpenAI, Google, and Perplexity are competing for artificial intelligence users in India by offering free plans. This strategy aims to acquire invaluable multilingual training data. Companies like Reliance Jio and Airtel provide platforms for reaching millions of users, significantly boosting engagement and filling gaps in AI models.
content: The competition among AI giants OpenAI, Google, and Perplexity has intensified, particularly in India, where they're offering free plans to engage a vast pool of users. This strategy is part of an effort to gather valuable multilingual training data ... [631 chars]

title: AI Stocks Propel Chinese Markets Amid US Economic Speculations
description: Mainland China and Hong Kong stocks bounced back after a two-day decrease, driven largely by gains in artificial intelligence stocks. The Shanghai Composite index rose by 1.19%, while Hong Kong's Hang Seng Index increased by 0.92%. Investors remain watchful of delayed U.S. economic data for future Federal Reserve policy directions.
content: In a remarkable rebound, stocks in Mainland China and Hong Kong rallied following a two-day slump, largely thanks to a surge in artificial intelligence shares. The Shanghai Composite index closed with a 1.19% gain, after hitting a two-month low just ... [879 chars]

title: European Stocks Erase Gains as Tech Shares Drop; FTSE 100 Rises
description: European stocks ceded their earlier gains as renewed concerns around artificial intelligence hit technology shares. The UK’s FTSE 100 outperformed after a bigger-than-expected drop in inflation.

title: Amazon in talks to invest about $10 billion in OpenAI
description: Amazon.com is in talks to invest in ChatGPT-maker OpenAI in a potential deal that could value the artificial intelligence firm at more than $500 billion, a source familiar with the matter has said.

title: Amazon announces biggest ever layoffs, to cut 8.5 per cent of employees working in THIS dept, details here
description: Amazon has announced that it will cut 370 jobs at its European headquarters in Luxembourg in the coming weeks. This will be the biggest round of job losses ever at this office. The cuts affect about 8.5 per cent of the 4,370 employees working there. The layoffs come after Amazon said in October that it would reduce its global workforce by 14,000 jobs as part of a wider shift toward artificial intelligence. - Amazon announces biggest ever layoffs, to cut 8.5 per cent of employees working in THIS dept, details here
